statements: DELETE FROM HotelFeedback WHERE guest_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM HotelFeedback WHERE rating > 4 AND review_date > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM HotelFeedback WHERE rating <= 2 OR (guest_name = 'John Doe' AND review_date < '2022-05-01');
DELETE FROM HotelFeedback WHERE feedback_text ILIKE '%poor%' AND rating < 3;
DELETE FROM Hotels WHERE rating < 3 AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM Hotels WHERE rating = (SELECT MAX(rating) FROM Hotels);
DELETE FROM GuestFeedback WHERE hotel_id = 1 AND rating < 3;
DELETE FROM Reviews WHERE review_id IN (SELECT review_id FROM Reviews WHERE review_text LIKE '%negative%');
DELETE FROM feedback WHERE hotel_id = 1 AND guest_id = 2;
DELETE FROM reviews WHERE hotel_id IN (SELECT hotel_id FROM hotels WHERE location = 'New York');
DELETE FROM Hotels WHERE star_rating < 3 AND location = 'New York';
